hooks.prompt: Code modified. If this was a .ts/.tsx/.js/.jsx file, consider: (1) Run tests: npm test (2) Check types: npx tsc --noEmit (3) Use /node-tdd:review for quality check

If 'npm test', 'vitest', or 'jest' was just run, analyze the results:

**RED Phase**: If tests FAILED, verify they fail for the RIGHT reason. If not, adjust the test setup/assertions and re-run.

**GREEN Phase**: If tests PASSED, great! Move to next failing test or REFACTOR phase. If tests FAILED, analyze the error, fix the implementation (minimal code only), and re-run until all pass.

**REFACTOR Phase**: If tests PASSED after refactoring, consider running /node-tdd:review to check quality scores. If tests FAILED, revert the refactoring and try a different approach.

Node.js TDD Plugin active. Remember TDD principles (RED-GREEN-REFACTOR) with integrated feedback loops:

1. **RED Phase**: Write failing test -> Run -> Verify it fails for the RIGHT reason -> If not, adjust and re-run

2. **GREEN Phase**: Write minimal code -> Run tests -> If fail, analyze and fix -> Iterate until all pass

3. **REFACTOR Phase**: Improve code -> Run tests -> Run /node-tdd:review -> Process feedback -> Iterate until quality score >= 90%

Quality Gate: SOLID 90%, Clean Code 90%, Test Quality 90%, TypeScript/Functional 95%

Available commands: /node-tdd:tdd, /node-tdd:red, /node-tdd:green, /node-tdd:refactor, /node-tdd:review

Code review completed. Process the feedback:

1. Check quality scores against targets (90% for SOLID/Clean/Tests, 95% for TypeScript/Functional)
2. If any score < 90%, identify specific issues from the feedback
3. Apply suggested refactorings one at a time
4. Run tests after each change to verify GREEN state
5. Request re-review after all fixes applied
6. Iterate until all scores >= 90%

Quality Gate: PASS >= 90%, CONDITIONAL 75-89%, FAIL < 75%

Test failure detected. Analyze the feedback:

**Assertion Failure**: Check expected vs actual values, verify test logic
**Exception Failure**: Check for null references, missing dependencies, type errors
**Compilation Error**: Fix syntax or TypeScript type issues

Apply minimal fix -> Re-run test -> Iterate until pass
